thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Michael Sorensen
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Michael Sorensen

author: Michael Sorensen
title: Michael Sorensen
text: We upgraded our controller card and display to the RDC control and new software, best thing we could have done for that machine. We needed several hand holding secession's with Boss Laser during the install and even if we couldn't get help that moment they promptly called back each time as promised. Good documentation, not great but the phone support made up for it. We mostly worked with Aaron, he was helpful and very courteous. We would most definitely purchase for Boss Laser again.
